title: Automatic washers unit shipments in the United States 2012 - 2019 , by quarter
summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Unit shipments in thousands in each Quarter on the y axis.
Quarter 4Q '19 has the highest Unit shipments in thousands and 1Q '12 has the lowest Unit shipments in thousands.
There is a difference of 1173.1 between the maximum Quarter 4Q '19 and minimum Quarter 1Q '12.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Unit shipments in thousands for 32 number of Quarters.
